official_title: To direct the Secretary of Education to establish a clearinghouse of information on best practices for ocean lifeguard training programs.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Education to establish a clearinghouse of information on best practices for states and local governments to use in carrying out ocean lifeguard training programs, particularly on materials and tests involving rip current awareness and safety.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Education to establish a clearinghouse of information on best practices for ocean lifeguard training programs.
